amendment.description: Amendment sought to prohibit funds in the bill from being used for a recompetition process for Manufacturing Extension Partnership centers.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 108-589 to prevent the use of appropriated funds for general re-competition of Manufacturing Extension Partnership (MEP) centers.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 197 (Roll no. 356).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson-Lee (TX).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 197 (Roll no. 356).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
